segments.text: I'd love that . I'm so glad I quit . It's time for a change .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does that mean you're going to take my advice ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I'm looking for a position as a chef .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I might be able to help ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sure you have great connections .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We'd like to open another restaurant ... with you as the head chef and manager ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? You have that much faith in me ? And Giovanni agreed to it ? Does he know who I am ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . But you know him . He's just worried that you're not Italian ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . He's afraid that no one will cook as good as his mother did .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ah ! I know a way to convince him that Americans can make good Italian food !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You'll see next week . I'll come by one day at lunchtime .
segments.speaker: S1
